column5: A friend's birthday is coming up and his wife and I are trying to organize a trip out on Lake O.  Any recommendations would be appreciated.  Thanks everyone....
I had a good experience with Andrew's Charters out of Port Credit. Put us onto fish and cooked a great roast beef dinner too.  Cheers, 1leg

SalmonExpress will put you on fish, and they are members of the Charter group that supplies Great Ontario Salmon Derby tickets with your charter.  So if you catch a big one, you can officially enter it into the derby.  You can also buy 1-day licenses aboard the boat for $10 a person if they don't have them  http://www.salmonexpress.com  Tony

How many people are going to be on the charter? Do you want food provided with the charter? Do you want big fish(generally later in the season), or smaller fish for a better meal? Just some questions you should consider I work on a Charter out of Port Credit so feel free to shoot me a PM if you have any specific questions.
no question hands down waye andrews is the guy to be with.  Always puts you on fish and is more concerned about the quality of your experience then the money at the end of the day
Try this website for some good charters, and be assured they are following all new government regulations.  http://www.ontariofishcharters.ca/
